QuestData.Title: Ploughshares to Swords
QuestData.Description: We have a sizeable army, but I'm afraid the coming showdown with the Neferset hordes will demand that all able-bodied tol'vir of Ramkahen and Orsis join in the fight.$B$BI want you to be at the forefront of our recruiting efforts.$B$BGo across the river, to the Akhenet Fields, and recruit the laborers that work there.
QuestData.CompletionText: You've returned, $n. How are the recruitment efforts faring?
QuestData.RewardText: You are a born leader, $n. It'll be good to have you by our side when war comes to these lands.
